text: Fuyuko, what kind of idol do you want to become.

It's obvious, isn't it.
That objective was decided from the start, you know.

What's up with asking that all of the sudden?
Did you feel it was neccessary to confirm it again?

Well, sort of... If you had said something more specific like
"I was to start focusing on acting" or something, I'd need to help.
Hearing your instant reply just now felt great!
